TopicTitle: Laythe Expeditionary Base - (flying, floating, VTOL ship with flight deck)

Articles.Content:
Description

Laythe Expeditionary Base is flying and floating ship with flight deck, that can be used for Kerbin or Laythe (and may be Eve) exploration. Base has 4 docking ports on flight deck, that can be used to transfer fuel to crafts, landed on flight deck directly or by using included refueling drones.

There are two download files: one with 3 craft files - one for base itself, another with base + 2 VTOL + 2 refuleing drones kit and third with base+VTOL+drone kit prepared with Laythe launch (with 2 stage launch vehicle and nuclear transfer stage); another download is save file with 3 bases deplyed - 2 on Kerbin (one base is near KSC, another in east hemisphire) and 1 on Laythe (with 2 VTOLs and 2 refuleing drones on board).

If you'll choose to launch base to Laythe using "Floating base launch.craft" use following ascent profile: fly stright up until 10.000 m, then begin slow gravity turn until ~30.000 (it is important to get at least 400 m/s of vertical speed). Use transfer stage engines along with second stage to reach apoapsis ~100 km, then use transfer stage to reach orbit. Jool transfer burn is ~1950 m/s of dV, duration is ~8 minutes (initial transfer stage TWR is ~0.3). It is not recommended to use physics wrap more than x2 during burn.

Tech info

Parts count: 321 (but ~40 are physicsless)

Flight deck size: 7x7 large plate platforms separated by flight control tower

Crew: 6 kerbals

Fuel capacity: 1 medium Kerbodyne tank

Engines: 12 jet engines (TWR: 1.45-1.52)

Speed in flight mode: ~200 m/s at ~40Ã‚Â° pitch

Max splash down vertical speed: 5-6 m/s

Flight deck can withstand: 15-ton VTOL craft landed at 4-5 m/s vertical speed

Action groups

1 - toggle jet engines

2 - toggle exterior lights

3 - toggle lights for flight deck near control tower

4 - toggle lights for fight deck

5 - toggle antenas on control tower mast

Images

Javascript is disabled. View full album

DOWNLOAD Craft files

DOWNLOAD Save file with 3 bases deployed on Laythe and Kerbin

Feel free to ask any questions. Thank you.
@xoknight: Thank you! Btw - now I wonder, is it practically possible to make floating airstrip large enough to horizontally land space plane.
Bravo, good sir. This looks like an excellent craft to enhance my Duna base. Or even just as a reference to build a better Mun base.
Holy moly! rep for you, good sir!
